## JSONObject.createText() method

Don't use createText directly. Be sure to use it through a proxy. The reason for setting the PlainText type as the return value is to provide the PlainText interface to the user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createText(key: string): PlainText;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[PlainText](./yorkie-js-sdk.plaintext.md)
